sources.title: Valley of Wanted Men
sources.description: Three ex-cons return to the scene of the crime to find the fourth bandit who kept the loot and turned them in.

sources.title: Valley of Wanted Men (1935) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Frankie Darro, LeRoy Mason, Russell Hopton 
Director: Alan James

Three men escape from prison, go back to their hometown to try to find out who framed them.

metadata.Plot: Three men that were sent to prison for bank robbery escape. The stolen money was never recovered and they return to the scene looking for the fourth man who has the money. Two of the robbers are out to get the money for themselves but the other who was framed wants to recover the money so he can clear himself.
metadata.Writer: Peter B. Kyne, Barry Barringer, Forrest Barnes
metadata.Actors: Frankie Darro, LeRoy Mason, Russell Hopton
